column2: "First, let me make my request. Thanks to your efforts, I have recalled a vague idea of what my wish could be."

"Someone, or something, has committed an error...
I wish to correct that mistake."

"However...
I cannot remember what that mistake might be."
"I know this is likely an impossible task, but I would have you find out what that mistake is and bring it to me."

"I expect this will take some time...
You have my gratitude for making the attempt."
